amendment.description: To limit the compensation of employees funded through the Employment and Training Administration.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3600 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3600 proposed by Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S3483-3486; text: CR S3483) To limit the compensation of employees funded through the Employment and Training Administration.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3600 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
